entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
